sweep.params

sweep.params

# sweep.params
# Parameter sweep configuration for batch simulations.
# Used by runSweepHamilton.sbatch by default.
# Sweep: Ec_h only (210 cases), logarithmically spaced from 0.01 to 10 (inclusive)

# ============================================================
# Base Configuration
# ============================================================
# Start from this parameter file and override sweep variables
BASE_CONFIG=default.params

# Optional: simulation source file in simulationCases/
# SOURCE_FILE_NAME=hypha.c

# ============================================================
# Case Number Range
# ============================================================
# Starting case number (4-digit: 1000-9999)
CASE_START=1306

# Ending case number (inclusive)
# 210 cases => CASE_END = CASE_START + 209
CASE_END=1515

# ============================================================
# Sweep Variables
# ============================================================
# Format: SWEEP_<variable>=value1,value2,value3,...
# The sweep will generate all combinations (cartesian product)
# Here we sweep only Ec_h, so there are exactly 210 combinations.
#
# You can sweep any parameter read by simulationCases/hypha.c by adding a
# matching SWEEP_ entry here, for example:
#   SWEEP_MAXlevel=9,10,11
#   SWEEP_tmax=100,200
#   SWEEP_Ohd=0.5,1.0
#   SWEEP_RhoR_dc=1.0,1.2
#   SWEEP_Ec_d=0.0,0.1
#   SWEEP_De_d=0.0,1.0
#   SWEEP_Ohf=0.5,1.0
#   SWEEP_hr=0.8,0.9
#   SWEEP_De_h=1e2,1e30
#   SWEEP_Oh_c=0.005,0.01
#   SWEEP_Ec_c=0.0,0.1
#   SWEEP_De_c=0.0,1.0
#   SWEEP_Bond=0.5,1.0
#   SWEEP_Ldomain=80,100
# Keep only the SWEEP_* keys you actually want active.

SWEEP_Ec_h=0.01,0.010353218433,0.0107189131921,0.0110975249641,0.0114895100019,0.0118953406737,0.0123155060329,0.0127505124071,0.0132008840083,0.0136671635646,0.0141499129827,0.014649714035,0.0151671690807,0.0157029018129,0.0162575580337,0.0168318064575,0.0174263395455,0.0180418743739,0.0186791535344,0.0193389450841,0.0200220425399,0.020729265012,0.0214614574764,0.0222194911927,0.0230042642561,0.0238167022872,0.0246577582597,0.0255284124619,0.0264296725996,0.0273625740485,0.0283281802519,0.0293275832661,0.0303619044615,0.0314322953747,0.032539938722,0.0336860495746,0.034871876694,0.0360987039948,0.0373678521403,0.0386806792702,0.0400385828528,0.0414430006545,0.0428954118283,0.0443973381217,0.0459503441971,0.0475560380654,0.0492160716356,0.0509321413887,0.0527059891692,0.0545394030954,0.0564342185878,0.0583923195142,0.060415639455,0.0625061630924,0.0646659277232,0.0668960249061,0.0691986012442,0.0715758592997,0.0740300586403,0.0765635160186,0.0791786056949,0.0818777599034,0.0846634694684,0.0875382845692,0.0905048156588,0.0935657345399,0.0967237755836,0.0999817360983,0.103342477832,0.106808927614,0.110384078135,0.114070988874,0.117872787158,0.121792668347,0.125833896151,0.13,0.134294605105,0.138721439846,0.14328442187,0.147987651215,0.152835423983,0.15783223564,0.162982784898,0.168292977178,0.173768928678,0.179417970098,0.185247650999,0.19126574479,0.197480253379,0.203899412513,0.210531697824,0.217385830649,0.224470784608,0.231795792955,0.239370356939,0.247204253175,0.255307541021,0.263690570951,0.272363992934,0.281338764837,0.290626160888,0.300237780241,0.310185555678,0.320481763473,0.331139033488,0.342170359541,0.353589109758,0.365409037008,0.377644289452,0.390309421218,0.403419403239,0.416989634274,0.431035952157,0.445574645236,0.460622463018,0.476196627081,0.492314842513,0.50899530989,0.526256737873,0.544118356519,0.562600931309,0.581725777926,0.601514777729,0.62199039295,0.64317568264,0.66509431974,0.687770607883,0.711229499926,0.735496615251,0.760598258036,0.786 # Output Configuration
